business_details.Business: The prosecution is able to establish the charge against the accused Kader Ali Sk under section 448 IPC and 8 of POCSO Act beyond all reasonable doubt and accordingly he is convicted under said sections. The accused/convict is sentenced to undergo rigorous imprisonment for 1 year and also pay fine of Rs.1000/- in default rigorous imprisonment for 15 days under section 448 IPC. The accused/convict is further sentenced to go rigorous imprisonment for 4 years and also pay fine Rs.5000/- in default rigorous imprisonment for 2 months under sections 8 of POCSO Act.
